Text.val: 06.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
20.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
28.04.2011 SH SCR16430 Replaced GB002 by GB902
20.03.2011 GB SCR16281 Changed source of value for the Approved
28.12.2006 AK SCR12184 fixed titles for translation in th online task
06.11.2006 AK SCR12013 Change formatting of SQLquery (the result stays the same)
04.11.2006 AK SCR12013 convert all values to client currency
03.10.2006 AK SCR11967 use GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATEinstead of GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO, CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CDTO_DATE, cast(sum((CDTO_CURRBALFACTACC + CDTO_CURRBALRETENTIONACC + CDTO_CURRBALDISPUTESACC + CDTO_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE)) as decimal(13,2) )as V_DEBTBAL, cast(sum(CDTO_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC)as decimal(13,2) ) as Extra_finance_balance, cast(sum(CDTO_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS)as decimal(13,2) ) as Arrangement_balance, cast(sum(CDTO_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY)as decimal(13,2) ) as Stock_balance, cast(sum(CDTO_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS)as decimal(13,2) ) as Overdrawings_balance, cast(sum( ( ( CDTO_CURRBALFACTACC + CDTO_CURRBALRETENTIONACC + CDTO_CURRBALDISPUTESACC + CDTO_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE ) + CDTO_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC + CDTO_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS + CDTO_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY + CDTO_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS ) ) as decimal(13,2) ) as V_TOTBAL, cast(sum(CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2) ) as Investment_balnce, cast(sum( CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT - ( CDTO_CURRBALFACTACC + CDTO_CURRBALRETENTIONACC + CDTO_CURRBALDISPUTESACC + CDTO_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE + CDTO_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC + CDTO_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS + CDTO_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY + CDTO_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS ) ) as decimal(13,2) ) as V_SHORTAGE, cast(sum(CDOV_OVERDRAWINGAGREED)as decimal(13,2) ) as Approved
FROM :1/CDTO left join :1/CDOV on CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO = CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO and CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO = CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CDOV_DATE = CDTO_DATE
WHERE :2 and CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO=:3 and CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO=:4
group by CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO, CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CDTO_DATE
order by CDTO_DATE
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
